description: This scholarship aims to support talented students by reducing financial barriers and enabling access to quality higher education at a reputed institution.
coverage: Coverage includes tuition fee support. Depending on the scholarship type, it may also cover partial or full funding, living allowance, accommodation, and health insurance.
